title: BMW Is Ready To Make Hydrogen Vehicles Available For Everyone, Worldwide

title: Why Smart Car Owners Are Putting Their Keys in Microwaves
description: Modern car thieves don't need to break windows or hot-wire ignitions anymore. They're using relay attacks to steal keyless entry vehicles in under 30 seconds, often while you're sleeping upstairs. Relay theft uses boosters to amplify the signal from a keyless remote control, meaning a key left ...
titleSummary: "Car Thieves Foiled by Clever Use of Kitchen Appliances"
descriptionSummary: Sophisticated car thieves are exploiting a vulnerability in modern vehicle security systems, using relay devices to amplify keyless remote signals and steal cars in as little as 30 seconds, often while owners are at home.
